content: PTH S Zi Sharp-point metal stud screws Interior metal framing screw (zinc-plated) for fastening stud or wire lath to track ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features The screws can be driven quickly thanks to optimized stitch point geometry Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti stitch-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 1002 performance requirements Applications Fastening wire lath to metal studs – maximum combined thickness 0.032 inch Fastening light track to light studs – maximum combined thickness 0.032 inch ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Truss head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Truss head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 25 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 10262 - Lathing screw zinc 8 x 1/2 PTH S - Package Size 10000 pc - 10263 - Lathing screw zinc 8 x 3/4 PTH S - Package Size 10000 pc - 10264 - Lathing screw zinc 8 x 1 PTH S - Package Size 8000 pc - 10265 - Lathing screw zinc 8 x 1- 1/4 PTH S - Package Size 6000 pc
